name: Fix it (itch) (AlvareitorHD)
description:
Demons have stolen the game resources. Your mission is start with nothing and rebuild the game. Compatible with Xbox controller.

This version is still in development: needs fix some bugs and add the rest components, such as the shop and ítems for complete the game.

WARNING: THE SHOP PART DOESN´T WORK DUE TO IT'S NOT COMPLETED AND GAME FREEZES (IT WILL BE AVAILABLE SOON).
